definition: of a term that cannot stand as the subject or (especially) the predicate of a proposition but must be used in conjunction with other terms
details:
adjective
- of a term that cannot stand as the subject or (especially) the predicate of a proposition but must be used in conjunction with other terms
= example: of a term that cannot stand as the subject or (especially) the predicate of a proposition but must be used in conjunction with other terms
